debutant.nom: Aim the ball down the line to the lefty's forehand.
debutant.description: Take the ball crosscourt into their backhand.

debutant.nom: Use quick, aggressive backhands crosscourt into their wide forehand.
debutant.description: Lock them up on their backhands with your forehand into their backhand.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Aggressive crosscourt backhands to the wide forehand
exercices_complementaires.description: Wait until the last second and then lunge for the ball as it breaks away, you're probably going to miss.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Forehand serves into your forehand that break away
exercices_complementaires.description: Wait until the last second and then lunge for the ball as it breaks away, you're probably going to miss.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Returning a lefty's forehand serve into your forehand
exercices_complementaires.description: Aim the ball down the line to the lefty's forehand. At the last minute you can take the ball crosscourt into their backhand.

metriques_progression.rep: Get used to how a lefty's shots come out
